item.title: GRIN (Combined Group Crisis Intervention and Assisting Individuals in Crisis)
item.description: Don't miss the opportunity to take a Critical Incident Stress Management course designed for Fire, EMS, Law Enforcement, and Chaplains! 1 person going

item.title: We have openings in our Child and Babysitting Course (CABS)
item.description: We have openings in our Child and Babysitting Course (CABS) for this evening 6p to 8p Free of charge. This course will be at JCESA Station 11 at 419 16th Ave Ranson 25438 Class Room 1 Send a message to learn more
